_header: All that will leally live in land
_description: The Rule of St Benedict — 2516 lines in couplets

BLCottVesAXXV.First Lines:
All þat wyll lely lyue in landAls sant Benet has
                    ordand…
BLCottVesAXXV.Last Lines:
…þen endles lif sal be þair medeVnto þat lif
                    our lord vs lede
BLCottVesAXXV.Attributed Title:
Regula beati benedicti in anglicis verbis translatis (f.
                    66)
BLCottVesAXXV.Editions:
Böddeker,  Karl. 
             “Versifizirte Benediktinerregel im Northern Dialect.” 
             Englische Studien
         2 (1879): 60-93: 61-93.
Kock,  E. A.,
                        ed.  
             Three Middle-English Versions of the Rule of St. Benet and two
                contemporary rituals for the ordination of nuns.
EETS o.s.
         120 (1902); repr. 1987: 48-118.
